Reviews.Title: “Safe, friendly, and convenient”
Reviews.Author: urbanpeach
Reviews.Content: returned trip birthday weeks ago solo trip female biggest concern safety hotel location worries safety conveniently located 12 block 5th ave quieter 5th ave dont worry music blaring night easily music hotel beside bar live music twice week 11 computer free internet access front mini lending library staff extremely friendly helpful spoke excellent english luxurious paying excellent value definitely stay thank carlos wonderful experience

Reviews.Title: “Convenient, quiet, clean, affordable and helpful”
Reviews.Author: TravelJunky4
Reviews.Content: ive stayed hotel coco rio 4 times location 12 block 5th ave pedestrian street tons restaurants shops hotels northern portion 5th ave little quieter access cleaner beach walk beach 5 minutes hotel discount chairs umbrellas mamitas beach club staff speaks english helpful excursions transportation tofrom airport else beat price location peace quiet

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for the price said!”
Reviews.Author: billiejoece
Reviews.Content: let´s start saying cheapest options i´ve found range price simple stay comfortable shower water wasn´t strong hard time getting temperature balance didn´t staff fix cause baths anyway people polite expansive

Reviews.Title: “Great place for a budget mind with A+ location!!”
Reviews.Author: joferto
Reviews.Content: stayed previously couple times night airport time stayed nights rate standard located floor king size bed tv ac bathroom clean water amenities clean service staff helfpul attentive car parking lucky park car entrance hotel considering low season location super cool middle main bars sleep night walking distance taxis available anytime parents stay night week cancun airport love hotel little italian awsome coffee pastries pdc cheap especially definetely safe whenever chance

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay, cheap price”
Reviews.Author: melleln
Reviews.Content: stay coco rio cheap hotel location staff didnt speak english doing help hotel nice interior garden fountain rooftop plenty restaurants near walking distance beach main street found parking car street recommend hotel travellers budget

Reviews.Title: “totally worth it!”
Reviews.Author: antonioibal
Reviews.Content: i´ve stayed coco rio hotel couple friends week originally planed stay 4 nights day decided move plans cancun enjoy coco rio amazing playa del carmen nightlife beaches night received gentle treatment staff juan carlos front desk manager treated amazing booking minute reservation giving 3 double bed top floor balcony price owner night shift girl don francisco night guardian giving smile partying late night hours hahaha truly recommend coco rio hotel located italian neighborhood restaurants near 2 block playa mamitas kool beach club friends

Reviews.Title: “Convenient, simple, clean and affordable with a friendly english-speaking staff”
Reviews.Author: TravelJunky4
Reviews.Content: ive stayed hotel coco rio times ive playa del carmen conveniently located 5th ave north busier noisier 5th ave short walk mamitas beach club hang beach closer lot restaurants prefer staff friendly accommodating speak english responded emails quickly helpful book email directly email address able save money booking online

Reviews.Title: “AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!! Total ripoff”
Reviews.Author: JaySchwag
Reviews.Content: booked 2 nights coco rio based reviews stay layout hotel nice lots trees nice little courtyard hammock outside clean bed comfy location 5th ave bad late checkout 8pm booking note arrived despite day told request disappeared coincidentally guest decided stay booted quickly else pay night hotel street arrange airport shuttle info sudden english worse playa dont words airport shuttle terrible service hot water told run 10 minutes 20 minutes barely tepid pressure key door leaving fiddling 5 minutes tv remote didnt 100 night total ripoff street service

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Playa!”
Reviews.Author: chewi2005
Reviews.Content: little hotel pleasant surprise cleanest hotel stayed nice balcony beautiful courtyard nice private sunning deck nice location close beach street directly 5th ave music door wed fri 11pm plenty eat close internet connection outside plenty outside tables seating stayed week stay time mexico nice friendly cat named blanca attached

Reviews.Title: “We Enjoyed Our Stay”
Reviews.Author: NWUSBeachBums
Reviews.Content: wife stayed coco rio 2 nights weve traveled eight location quiet town hotel 5th street easy access restaurants beach dont remember name restaurant corner food close coco rio staff pleasant hotel friendly helpful highly recommend coco rio short stays playa del carmen

Reviews.Title: “Coco Rio is a great small boutique hotel that is clean and quite nice”
Reviews.Author: ldevost
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights coco rio 80 american night taxes included spacious doors balconey chairs overlooking streeet executive 2 double beds kitchenette cool bathroom hotel hammock sitting level look onto inner courtyard hotel 30 set neat courtyard clean spacious front desk spoke fluent english situated north 5th street playa del quiet beside luna hotel rated top 10 stay playa twice expensive believe complaint water pressure showers day improved whatever reason stay luna hotel beside lounge live music plays 11 pm bed earlier lounge butts coco rio hotel

HotelInfo.Name: Coco Rio Playa del Carmen
HotelInfo.Address: Calle 26 no 125 | Entre 5ta y 10a Avenida, Playa del Carmen 77710, Mexico
